games.plots.plots_parameter_estimation module

Created on Wed Jun 15 15:19:16 2022

@author: kate

plot_chi_sq_trajectory(chi_sq_list: List[float]) → None[source]

Plots the chi_sq trajectory following an optimization run

Parameters

chi_sq_list – a list of floats defining the chi_sq value at each function evaluation

Return type

None

plot_training_data_fits(df_opt: pandas.DataFrame) → None[source]

Plots fits to training data with similarly good r_sq values

Note: This function is not currently generalizable to other models and datasets and the

user must modify before running

Parameters

df_opt – a dataframe containing the parameter estimation results after optimization

Return type

None

plot_parameter_distributions_after_optimization(df_opt: pandas.DataFrame, parameter_labels: List[str]) → None[source]
Plot parameter distributions across initial guesses

following parameter estimation with training data

Parameters

  • df_opt – a dataframe containing the parameter estimation results after optimization

  • parameter_labels – a list of strings defining the parameter labels

Return type

None
